short_description: fastpath function used to parse text
long_description: fastpath function used to parse text

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column whose contents are to be tokenized.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column whose contents are to be tokenized.

argument_clauses.name: ConvertToLowerCase
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to convert input text to lowercase.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to convert input text to lowercase.

argument_clauses.name: StemTokens
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to stem the tokens.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to stem the tokens.

argument_clauses.name: RemoveStopWords
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to remove stop words from the input text before parsing.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to remove stop words from the input text before parsing.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: Delimiter
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies an expression that represents the word delimiter.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies an expression that represents the word delimiter.

argument_clauses.name: Punctuation
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies an expression that represents the punctuation characters to replace with a space in the input text.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies an expression that represents the punctuation characters to replace with a space in the input text.

argument_clauses.name: TokenColName
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the output column that contains the individual tokens from the input document.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the output column that contains the individual tokens from the input document.
